item.title: Whale "Sets 10 Major Goals First" to Short BTC, Reaching a Position Size of $217 Million
item.description: On July 23rd, the contract trading whale user "First Set 10 Big Goals" posted on social media "Real-name Shorting". According to the screenshot provided by the user, they are currently using 36.2 million US dollars as collateral, holding a short position of 1817 BTC, with a position size of 217 million US dollars. The entry price is 119,425 US dollars and the liquidation price is 133,678 US dollars.

item.title: US Stock Market Company Skycorp Solar to Accept Cryptocurrency Payments and Invest in Ethereum
item.description: On July 23rd, according to official information, the Nasdaq-listed company Skycorp Solar Group Limited (stock code: PN) declared that starting from August 1st, it will commence accepting Bitcoin, Ethereum, as well as major stablecoins like USDC and USDT as international transaction payment means. The solar photovoltaic product supplier also intends to allocate a portion of its cash reserves and earnings from renewable energy projects to a strategic acquisition of Ethereum as part of its long-term digital asset management strategy.

item.title: PENGU Token Deployment Address transferred an additional 2.266 billion tokens to a CEX in the past 24 hours.
item.description: On July 23rd, as monitored by on-chain data analyst Yu Jin, in the past 24 hours, 226.6 million PENGU tokens (approximately $9.05 million) have been continuously transferred from the PENGU token deployment address to multiple CEXs.Since July 12th, a total of 1.81 billion PENGU tokens (approximately $54.61 million) have been transferred from the PENGU token deployment address to CEXs.

item.title: WLFI Associated Address bought 6144 ETH in the last 20 minutes
item.description: On July 23rd, as per on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the address linked to the Trump family-backed project WLFI, which is 0x77a...F94F6, has utilized a total of 2300 USDC to acquire 6144.97 ETH within the past 20 minutes. Up to now, the cumulative amount of ETH purchased through three WLFI transactions in the past six days has risen to 10,013.54 ETH (approximately $35.98 million), with an average price of $3593.

item.title: One of the world's largest market makers, Citadel Securities, urges the SEC to regulate tokenized stocks rigorously
item.description: On July 23rd, one of the world's largest market makers, Citadel Securities, recently made a plea to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to impose equivalent regulations on tokenized stocks and traditional stocks.In a letter sent to the SEC's Crypto Asset Working Group this week, the company stated that regulators should refrain from granting exemptions from securities rules and instead focus on market liquidity and investor protection. "In short, while we wholeheartedly support technological innovation aimed at addressing market inefficiencies, attempting to issue 'securities-like' products through regulatory arbitrage is far from being innovative."TD Cowen analyst Jaret Seiberg also pointed out in a research report on Monday that there remains uncertainty in tokenized trading mechanisms, with some of the challenges revolving around optimal price discovery. "The traditional stock trading system requires achieving the national best bid or offer, which is what gives rise

item.title: WLFI's associated address has once again increased its ETH holdings by 1740 coins. In the past 6 days, WLFI has acquired a total of 5608 ETH.
item.description: On July 23rd, according to on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), the WLFI-related address added another 1740 ETH to its position just 2 minutes ago, with a value of $6.5 million.Over the past six days, three WLFI addresses have collectively purchased a total of 5608.48 ETH (approximately $19.46 million) at an average price of $3469.66. This amount has already achieved a profit of $1.457 million.

item.title: A new address withdrew 400 BTC from Binance, worth approximately $47.49 million.
item.description: On July 23rd. Based on the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a newly established wallet address withdrew 400 BTC from Binance two hours ago. The value of this withdrawal is approximately $47.49 million.

item.title: An address created recently increased its ETH holdings by 32,600 coins through an OTC trade 20 minutes ago.
item.description: On July 23rd, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, the newly established wallet address 0x3dF3 has just completed another over-the-counter (OTC) purchase of 32,640 ETH (valued at $122.18 million), and it has accumulated a total of 43,787 ETH (worth $163 million) over the past 4 days.

item.title: US Stock Market and Cryptocurrency Stocks See Mixed Results, Circle (CRCL) Drops by 8.23%
item.description: On July 23rd, based on market data, the U.S. stock market closed on Tuesday. The Dow Jones initially increased by 0.4%, the S&P 500 index rose slightly, and the Nasdaq decreased by 0.39%. Cryptocurrency stocks had mixed performances, including:Coinbase (COIN) decreased by 2.22%, with a trading volume of $58.99 billion.Circle (CRCL) decreased by 8.23%, and the trading volume was $36.86 billion.MARA Holdings (MARA) increased by 5.58%, and the trading volume was $10.66 billion.BTCS (BTCS) increased by 5.59%, and the trading volume was $7.05 billion.Bit Digital (BTBT) decreased by 1.51%, and the trading volume was $1.38 billion.SharpLink Gaming (SBET) increased by 8.54%, and the trading volume was $16.03 billion.Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) increased by 1.92%, and the trading volume was $11.04 billion.

item.title: Trend Research withdrew 203,000 ENS from Binance 10 hours ago.
item.description: On July 23rd, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), Trend Research of LD Capital withdrew 203,105 ENS from Binance 10 hours ago, with a value of approximately $5.5 million. A year ago, the institution carried out swing trading with 80,000 ENS. Based on the deposit and withdrawal prices, it is estimated that there was a loss of about $122,000 at the exit price.
